XData.name: BPL
XData.Data: <process language='objectscript' request='Scan.CheckEmployeeRequest' response='Scan.CheckEmployeeResponse' height='2000' width='2000' > <context> <property name='IsRelated' type='%String' instantiate='0' > <parameters> <parameter name='MAXLEN' value='50' /> </parameters> </property> <property name='IsExternal' type='%String' instantiate='0' > <parameters> <parameter name='MAXLEN' value='50' /> </parameters> </property> <property name='ToAddress' type='%String' instantiate='0' > <parameters> <parameter name='MAXLEN' value='50' /> </parameters> </property> </context> <sequence xend='200' yend='850' > <call name='Check Relation' target='Scan.GetEmployeeDetails' async='1' xpos='200' ypos='250' > <request type='Scan.CheckRelationRequest' > <assign property="callrequest.ID" value="request.ID" action="set" /> </request> <response type='Scan.CheckRelationResponse' > <assign property="response.IsRelated" value="callresponse.IsRelated" action="set" /> <assign property="context.IsRelated" value="callresponse.IsRelated" action="set" /> </response> </call> <call name='Check Email' target='Scan.GetEmployeeDetails' async='1' xpos='200' ypos='350' > <request type='Scan.ValidateToAddressRequest' > <assign property="callrequest.ToAddress" value="request.ToAddress" action="set" /> </request> <response type='Scan.ValidateToAddressResponse' > <assign property="response.IsExternal" value="callresponse.IsExternal" action="set" /> <assign property="context.IsExternal" value="callresponse.IsExternal" action="set" /> </response> </call> <sync name='Wait for Responses' calls='Check Relation,Check Email' timeout='30' type='all' xpos='200' ypos='450' /> <assign name="Assign to context" property="context.ToAddress" value="request.ToAddress" action="set" xpos='200' ypos='550' /> <rule name='Treat As Internal Email?' rule='TreatAsInternal' resultLocation='response.IsExternal' xpos='200' ypos='650' > </rule> <call name='Add Address to File' target='Scan.AddToAddressFile' async='1' xpos='200' ypos='750' > <request type='Scan.AddAddressRequest' > <assign property="callrequest.IsExternal" value="context.IsRelated" action="set" /> <assign property="callrequest.IsRelated" value="context.IsExternal" action="set" /> <assign property="callrequest.ToAddress" value="request.ToAddress" action="set" /> </request> </call> </sequence> </process>
